title: Wonder Egg Priority
synopsis: Following the suicide of her best and only friend, Koito Nagase, Ai Ooto is left grappling with her new reality. With nothing left to live for, she follows the instructions of a mysterious entity and gets roped into purchasing an egg, or specifically, a Wonder Egg.
characters: ['Ooto, Ai', 'Kawai, Rika', 'Sawaki, Momoe', 'Aonuma, Neiru', 'Kurita, Kaoru', 'Frill', 'Ura-Acca', 'Awano, Kotobuki', 'Nagase, Koito', 'Acca']
voices: ['Aikawa, Kanata', 'Saitou, Shuka', 'Yano, Hinaki', 'Kusunoki, Tomori', 'Misawa, Sachika', 'Yamaguchi, Megumi', 'Takahashi, Hiroki', 'Tadokoro, Azusa', 'Uchida, Yuuya']
